## Quaternion.LookRotation() method

Creates a rotation with the specified forward and upwards directions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static LookRotation(forward: Vector3, up?: Vector3): Quaternion;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  forward | <code>Vector3</code> | the direction to look in |
|  up | <code>Vector3</code> | the vector that defines in which direction up is |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Quaternion`
